column5: Leaving for Lac Seul on Thursday and would like to hear how the fishing is. Im just like a little kid who cant wait to go to the Zoo. Thanks for the info.
All the fish are dead. Please stay home. Thank you
cabdriver....May your transmission fall out and your engine blow up and all your tires be as flat as pancakes. Oh yeah, hope you get kidney stones too.
Heard they drained the lake to add more structure (reefs) and take care of the the silting issues. Said it would take 4-5 years to fill it up. Try another lake
Sounds like Lac Seul is in awful bad shape. Guess I will just have to go down to my Grampas pond and catch bass and catfish all day.

Did hear treasure hunting was good around Cox's island and McKenzie Bay. Tons of lures and lower units to be found. If you make it up, see if you can find my skeg, lost it up Altimeter creek @ the hairpin turn.
